inputs.name: target
inputs.label: Target platform
inputs.helpMarkDown: The target platform of your application.

inputs.name: projectDirectory
inputs.label: Path to the project folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: The path to the project folder (which contains the `pubspec.yaml`)

inputs.name: flutterDirectory
inputs.label: Path to the Flutter SDK
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to the Flutter SDK if not using Flutter Install task before this one.

inputs.name: debugMode
inputs.label: Debug
inputs.helpMarkDown: Force build type to be Debug instead of Release.

inputs.name: buildFlavour
inputs.label: Build Flavour
inputs.helpMarkDown: The flavour of the build, (e.g. production, development). Must match either an Android Gradle flavour or Xcode scheme.

inputs.name: buildNumber
inputs.label: Package build number
inputs.helpMarkDown: An identifier used as an internal version number. Each build must have a unique identifier to differentiate it from previous builds.

inputs.name: buildName
inputs.label: Version number
inputs.helpMarkDown: An `x.y.z` string used as the version number shown to users. For each new version of your app, you should provide a version number to differentiate it from previous versions.

inputs.name: buildOptionalCommand
inputs.label: Optional command
inputs.helpMarkDown: Add an optional (additional) command to the build, this is a free text command.

inputs.name: apkTargetPlatform
inputs.label: Target platform architecture
inputs.helpMarkDown: Sets the target android platform architecture

inputs.name: iosCodesign
inputs.label: Codesign application bundle
inputs.helpMarkDown: Indicates whether the application bundle should be codesigned. **Warning: you must install a valid certificate before build with the `Install an Apple Certificate`task**
